title: Katsutomo Oshiba
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Oshiba was born in <a href="Yamanashi%20Prefecture">Yamanashi Prefecture</a> on May 10, 1973. After graduating from <a href="Meiji%20University">Meiji University</a>, he joined <a href="Japan%20Football%20League%20%281992%E2%80%9398%29">Japan Football League</a> club <a href="Ventforet%20Kofu">Ventforet Kofu</a> based in his local in 1996. He played many matches as forward from first season and the club was promoted to new league <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> from 1999. In 2000, he moved to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="JEF%20United%20Chiba">JEF United Ichihara</a>. He played many matches as offensive midfielder and forward. However his opportunity to play decreased in 2003. In 2004, he moved to J2 club <a href="Vegalta%20Sendai">Vegalta Sendai</a>. He played many matches as forward until 2005. However his opportunity to play decreased in 2006 and he retired end of 2006 season.
